revision.text: Possibly: A defence of the church-government, faith, worship & spirit of the Presbyterians : in answer to a late book intituled, An apology for Mr. Thomas Rhind : or an account of the manner how, and the reasons for which he separated from the Presbyterian party, and embraced the communion of the Church / by John Anderson M.A. minister of the Gospel in Dumbarton. (Glasgow : Printed by Hugh Brown, M.DCC.XIV. [1714]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1883564~S1
